MemoryInfobox.location: Leader House, Obsidian Islands|Leader House, Melos

General_Description: '''Upon Typhon's Crown''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''Stand atop where leaders dwell and you will see my isle. [[Typhon's Revenge]] is where I am - come visit for a while. Scale the mountain forged of fire, for at its peak I sit. But fear the smog and doom and heat, for they will test your gift.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the engraving.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
